instruction_set.description: Verify the Homepage URL and Initial Display.Navigate to google website
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are on the google homepage with the correct URL.

instruction_set.description: TestCase 1: Verify the Homepage URL and Initial Display.Get the URL of the page and verify
instruction_set.error_out: Get the URL of the page and verify
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you check the url of the page contains google

instruction_set.description: TestCase 1: Verify the Homepage URL and Initial Display.Verify the initial display is zero
instruction_set.error_out: Verify the initial display is zero
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the initial value displayed is equal to 0

instruction_set.description: TestCase 2: Verify Addition and Subtraction Operation.Click on 5, 7 and plus element
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are clicking on the 5, 7 and plus button

instruction_set.description: TestCase 2: Verify Addition and Subtraction Operation.Verify that the result is 12
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the result displayed is equal to 12

instruction_set.description: TestCase 2: Verify Addition and Subtraction Operation.Click on 15, 8 and minus element
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are clicking on the 15, 8 and minus button

instruction_set.description: TestCase 2: Verify Addition and Subtraction Operation.Verify that the result is 7
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the result displayed is equal to 7

instruction_set.description: TestCase 3: Verify the functionality of AC Button and Multiplication Operation.Click on 10, 3 and multiply element
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are clicking on the 15, 8 and minus button

instruction_set.description: TestCase 3: Verify the functionality of AC Button and Multiplication Operation.Verify that the result is 30
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the result displayed is equal to 7

instruction_set.description: TestCase 3: Verify the functionality of AC Button and Multiplication Operation.Click on the All Clear(AC) button
instruction_set.error_out: Click on the All Clear(AC) button
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are clicking on AC button

instruction_set.description: TestCase 3: Verify the functionality of AC Button and Multiplication Operation.Verify the display is zero
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the value displayed is equal to 0

instruction_set.description: TestCase 4: Verify Divide Operation.Click on 20, 4 and divide element
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are clicking on the 20, 4 and division button

instruction_set.description: TestCase 4: Verify Divide Operation.Verify that the result is 5
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the value displayed is equal to 5
